A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Total letdown. (SPOILERS AHEAD) It’s like wtf movie were these reviewers watching? Luke is a whiner and a failed master who doesn’t even cross blades before dying. Leia flying through space like Ms. Marvel. Snoke dying without any backstory. Then compound this with the dreck from TFA like the utterly lazy concept of the first order. Not to mention that they chase the rebel fleet for hours and can’t destroy it because they stay just out of range? Wtf? Terrible movie on so many levels.
